title: These pocket-size night vision binoculars are just $100 now
description:
Warmer weather means later nights outdoors, and if you’re doing an activity like hunting, fishing, camping, photography, and more, you might wish you could see better at night. With the Mini Dual Tube Digital Night Vision Binoculars with 1080p HD Recording, you can, and they’re on sale for 37% off now.

These pocket-sized binos let you look ahead up to 300 meters in the dark with a 10x optical magnification lens. They’re equipped with seven adjustable brightness levels and four color effects to let you find the best way to see through the dark in your given situation.

Better yet, they’re not just binoculars. You can also take 1080p FHD videos and photos in both day or night. With a 2,260mAh battery capacity and support for TF cards up to 32GB, they can operate like the coolest night vision camera you’ve ever had.

Gear up for summer nighttime activities. Right now, you can get the Mini Dual Tube Digital Night Vision Binoculars with 1080p HD Recording for 37% off $159 at just $99.99.

 

Mini Dual Tube Digital Night Vision Binoculars with 1080p HD Recording – $99.99
